page.title: 13The Sidings.The Betting Shop
page.content: {The Sidings}was the site office of the builders of Sighthill.Made into a pub, it was decorated in a railways theme. Opening every day,except New Years Day the hours are Mon-Wed 1100-2200 and Thur-Sun 1100 to 2300,being closed from 1430 to 1830 on Sun.Busiest days are at the weekend.Customers must be 18 years old.The spirit most drunk is whisky and lager is the popular beer. {The Betting Shop}is open from Mon-Sat, from 1100 until the time of the last horse race.Averaging 200-300 customers each day Thur and Sat are the busiest. Bets are made on all kinds of sports, football,cricket,snooker,motor racing, greyhound racing and the most popular, horse racing.Races on which most money is gambled are the Grand National,the Derby,and the Saint Leger.No credit is given and customers must be aged 18. Larger winnings could be about Â£1000.
